name: gotosocial
tagline: A self-hosted federated social server compatible with ActivityPub
description: GoToSocial is a self-hosted, federated social network server compatible with Mastodon and ActivityPub. It focuses on lightweight deployment and better moderation tools for smaller communities and individuals.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource requirements designed for single-user or small community instances

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Use existing Mastodon mobile apps and clients with GoToSocial backend

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Granular privacy settings for posts, followers, and account visibility

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Share images, videos, and audio with customizable upload limits

features.title: REST API
features.description: Full ActivityPub and Mastodon-compatible API for client applications
